translations: adj.致有丝分裂的；促有丝分裂的

phrs.translation: 有丝分裂因子, 致有丝分裂因子, 细胞有丝分裂促进因子, 促分裂因子
促进细胞分裂激素, 细胞分裂因子, 进细胞破裂激素
淋巴细胞有丝分裂因子
缺氧诱导丝裂原因子, 缺氧诱导有丝分裂因子, 因子

sentences.sentence: Cyclin D1 which functions as a mitogenic sensor and allosteric activator of CDK4/6, is one of the more frequently altered cell cycle regulators in cancers.
sentences.translation: 细胞周期蛋白D1作为一个能促进有丝分裂和CDK4的变构激活剂，是癌症中较频繁变化的细胞周期调节子。

sentences.sentence: Concomitantly, this compound showed mitogenic activity when challenged with normal lymphocytes and was also found to be involved in the inflammatory response.
sentences.translation: 与此同时，表明这种化合物有丝分裂活动时，与正常细胞的挑战，同时也发现，参与炎症反应。

sentences.sentence: Objective To discuss the relationship between estradiol and the mitogenic activated protein kinase signal transduction pathway and the expression of the MAPK in the MCF-7 breast cancer cell-line.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨雌二醇与有丝分裂素激活蛋白激酶（MAPK）信号通路的关系以及MAPK在乳腺癌细胞系中的表达情况。
